resources.string: Password cannot be less than 8 characters!
Start by creating your account on DAISY
Login with your account on DAISY
Enter the email you registered with \non DAISY to receive a password \nreset link

DAISY (Dermatological AI System for Your Skin) is a specialized app designed to diagnose common skin conditions using advanced AI technology. With a focus on providing accurate and timely skin health assessments, DAISY helps you identify skin issues and offers tailored recommendations for over-the-counter medications or ointments to aid in treatment. Your skin health is now just a tap away, with reliable guidance for managing everyday skin concerns.

Welcome to DAISY! We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use the DAISY application. We periodically revise this Privacy Policy to ensure that we always comply with applicable data protection regulations.

We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and other contact information when you register or use our services. We may also collect non-personal technical information, such as your device type and app usage statistics.
The information we collect is used to provide our services, understand your needs and preferences, improve our products and services, and for legal compliance purposes.
We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, unauthorized use, modification, and unauthorized disclosure.
If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at the email or phone number below.
Welcome to DAISY! Please carefully review the terms and conditions of using this application before utilizing our services.

1.1. By downloading, installing, or using the DAISY application, you are deemed to have read, understood, and agreed to these terms and conditions.\n1.2. If you do not agree to these terms and conditions, you are not permitted to use the DAISY application.

2.1. The DAISY application provides early detection of skin diseases through gallery and camera features. This service is offered as is and may be updated from time to time.\n2.2. We are not responsible for the accuracy or completeness of the detection results provided by this application.

3.1. Our Privacy Policy governs the collection, use, and protection of your personal information while using the DAISY application.\n3.2. By using this application, you agree to the collection and use of your information in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

4.1. You agree not to use this application for unlawful or unauthorized purposes.\n4.2. You are responsible for the activities you conduct within this application, including the use of data you upload or share.

5.1. We may update these terms and conditions from time to time. Changes will take effect immediately upon being published in the application.\n5.2. We recommend that you periodically review these terms and conditions to ensure you understand the applicable requirements.
6.1. If you have any questions or issues regarding these terms and conditions, please contact us via the email or phone number provided below.
DAISY is an application that facilitates detection of skin diseases through the use of gallery and camera for everyone.
Are you sure you want to quit?
Upload or take a picture of your skin condition here
Use Camera Or Gallery to \nPick Image
Account has been registered \n Check Your Email to Activate Your Account
Are you sure you want to delete?

\"DAISY keeps a record of your diagnosis history, helping you track your skin’s condition. While it offers quick assessments, we recommend seeing a dermatologist for a more accurate diagnosis and proper treatment, especially for persistent or severe issues."
Image classifier failed to initialize. See error logs for details
You are healthy. Keep it up!
Oleskan tipis pada area kulit yang teriritasi 2-3 kali sehari
Kompres dingin untuk meredakan gatal dan hindari menggaruk lesi kulit.
Minum 1 kapsul 1-2 kali sehari setelah makan sesuai dosis yang dianjurkan.
Hindari alergen yang memicu biduran dan gunakan pakaian berbahan lembut.
Oleskan 1-3 kali sehari pada kulit yang terkena bisul.
Kompres dengan kain bersih yang sudah direndam air hangat, hindari memecahkan bisul secara paksa.
Oleskan tipis 1-2 kali sehari pada area yang berjerawat.
Cuci wajah dengan sabun ringan 2x sehari dan hindari penggunaan produk berminyak.
Oleskan tipis-tipis pada area kulit yang terinfeksi 2× sehari setelah dibersihkan dan dikeringkan.
Hindari pakaian ketat dan jaga area yang terinfeksi tetap kering.
Oleskan dan biarkan 10-15 menit, bilas dengan air hangat 2-3 kali seminggu.
Jaga kulit tetap kering dan hindari berbagi handuk dengan orang lain.
Kulit Anda dalam kondisi sehat. Jaga kebersihan kulit dengan rutin mandi dan gunakan pelembap yang sesuai dengan jenis kulit Anda.
